CmdLine: rm -rf /etc/service/sshd /etc/my_init.d/00_regen_ssh_host_keys.sh &&     mkdir -p /etc/service/go-agent &&     export DEBIAN_FRONTEND=noninteractive &&     apt-get update &&     apt-get upgrade -y --force-yes &&     apt-get install -y git openjdk-7-jre-headless sudo unzip &&     update-alternatives --install /usr/bin/java java /usr/java/jre1.8.0_31/bin/java 1 &&     update-alternatives --set java /usr/java/jre1.8.0_31/bin/java &&     dpkg -i /tmp/go-agent.deb &&     sed -i -e 's/DAEMON=Y/DAEMON=N/' /etc/default/go-agent /etc/default/go-agent &&     apt-get clean && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/* /tmp/* /var/tmp/*
